snippet.desc: Allows an image to be used as a light source.
snippet.description: Allows an image to be used as a light source.
snippet.name: Draw Light Radius

snippet.desc: A simple snippet for switching to a new scene when the player actor enters a region.
snippet.description: A simple snippet for switching to a new scene when the player actor enters a region.
snippet.name: Switch Scene

region.desc: The region that the player must enter to switch to the new scene.
region.name: region

snippet.desc:
This atttaches to a switch actor. When activated (Press Space), opens a path.

You will need to double click on the Switch Actor inside the scene then select the block Actor. This will notify the behavior that the block you selected will disappear after the switch is triggered, removing the block from the players path.
snippet.description:
This atttaches to a switch actor. When activated (Press Space), opens a path.

You will need to double click on the Switch Actor inside the scene then select the block Actor. This will notify the behavior that the block you selected will disappear after the switch is triggered, removing the block from the players path.
snippet.name: Switch Activation

actor.desc: This is the block Actor in the way of the exit. This will dissappear when the switch is pulled.
actor.name: _BlockingBlock

snippet.desc: Allows the player to move in 4 directions: North, South, West,and East Allows the player to move in 8 directions: North, South, West, East, NorthWest, NorthEast, SouthWest, SouthEast Allows the player to move isometrically.
snippet.description: Allows the player to move in 4 directions: North, South, West,and East Allows the player to move in 8 directions: North, South, West, East, NorthWest, NorthEast, SouthWest, SouthEast Allows the player to move isometrically.
snippet.name: 4 Way Movement

number.desc: How fast it reaches top speed.
number.name: accel

number.desc: How quickly it loses speed when the key's let go.
number.name: decel

boolean.desc: Check this if you want this actor to be controlled by the player.
boolean.name: player

boolean.desc: Check this if you want your character to move isometrically.
boolean.name: _IsometricMovement

number.desc: Speed below which we display the "idle" animation.
number.name: idleSpeed

boolean.desc: Check this to allow 8-way movement. An actor cannot move both isometrically and 8 ways.
boolean.name: _8WayMovement

snippet.desc: Switches to another scene when this actor is touched.
snippet.description: Switches to another scene when this actor is touched.
snippet.name: Switch Scene When Touched

scene.desc: The scene that should be switched to.
scene.name: _ScenetoSwitchTo

snippet.desc:
Fades out the actor and kills it after a specified time.
You can also set the fade time to zero and have no fade.
snippet.description:
Fades out the actor and kills it after a specified time.
You can also set the fade time to zero and have no fade.
snippet.name: Fade Out and Die after Time

number.desc:
The time in seconds it takes for the actor to begin fading out.

Default: 1
number.name: _StartFadingAfter

number.desc:
The amount of time in seconds it takes the actor to fade all the way out and die.

Default: 3
number.name: _FadeTime
